plot: Our Heroes find themselves eyeball deep in corporate politics after they decide to seek shelter at a hotel taken over by a group of white collar survivors. While they're participating in trust falls and talking stick circles, someone tries to kill Murphy by shooting him. Suddenly faced with a possible killer in their midst, our Heroes play a dangerous game of "Clue" - with zombies!

The survivors flee from zombies and smoke and they reach a derelict hotel; however they discover a group of executives stranded in the place since the Zombie Apocalypse. Their leader Gideon Gould receives Warren and the group and he explains that they have internal rules of behavior to improve their relationship. When someone wants to speak, they have a talking stick and their decision is taken by vote. When the groups are integrating, they hear a gunshot and find Murphy and Greg wounded on the floor. Soon they accuse Iggy of stealing food and shooting Murphy and Greg and they expel him from the hotel. Meanwhile Doc discovers that the bullet passed through Murphy and brought his blood to Greg that is transforming into a zombie. Is Iggy the responsible for the shot?—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
